About

Driven by tenacity, a professional who masters new skills through passion and hard work.

I've always liked to know things and share what I learn with others. My career has taken on many different shapes and colors, from tutoring languages to working in a gaming company, and from providing customer solutions to being an analyst in two exclusively French-speaking environments - Throughout these varied roles, my drive has remained constant.

I seek out challenges that foster personal growth and contribute to a better world. That's why I look forward to developing valuable applications with real-world impact. Deploying Machine Learning solutions gives me the opportunity to make a difference.

As a developer, my strong skills in critical thinking and problem-solving make me a valuable asset to any fast-growing company. I am eager about contributing and excelling in dynamic environments.

My Interests:  NLP and Misinformation // Data Science for Linguistics Research // Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in Robotics  // Game Development

Fun Facts About Me:  I'm currently learning my 6th language - German //  I play piano and trombone, played the latter for 5 years in an orchestra //  I love building hardware! Check out my latest Linux Powered Rig on PcPartPicker

Projects

TailTeller

Machine Learning & Data Science web app that identifies dog breeds through images.

Accomplishments
  • A.I model developed to identify dog breeds with 93% accuracy.
  • Uses Streamlit for end-user interface.
  • Backend built with Tensorflow, Scikit-learn, Keras.
  • Analyzes the data with Seaborn, Plotly, Pandas.
  • Full model conception & data showcase run-down available in the Jupyter Notebooks directory on Github.
Home Cooked Harmony

Full Stack recipe blog, sharing and discovering for culinary enthusiasts.

Accomplishments
  • Web app built with Django, Bootstrap, and Javascript.
  • Includes user authentication, full CRUD capabilities, 'like' feature for posts, and search functionality.
  • Uses a PostgreSQL database.
Dice Mania

Retro-looking CLI project that simulates a dice game with an ASCII GUI.

Accomplishments
  • Web app built with python to generate randomness using an ASCII dictionary to iterate and simulate a dice throw.
    Try it out! Can you win the jackpot?
